A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan of the franchise\, this one didn't hit the mark.  The Force Awakens renewed my energy for the saga but this movie was very poorly done.  Too much humor\, and the humor was il-timed.  We were told this would be a darker movie\, there was nothing dark about it.  I hope we can get JJ Abrams back for the last one\, Rian Johnson wasn't up to the task.
